title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment) order 2022

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
with effect from 25 November 2022.
text_norm: 2 patrick cluskey particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment effect 25 november 2022

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 3. Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
with effect from 25 November 2022. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 December, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [681] 3
